item.description:
Antje Duvekot is a folk musician with a beautiful voice. You can check out her music here:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKnTpRvdQJI

I don't know how much it will cost for the show yet, but it's usually between 10-20$ for general admission at the Vanilla Bean. The restaurant serves excellent food and beer/wine/coffee/tea etc.  The show itself probably starts at 8, but I want to go early so we can grab a bite and talk before it begins.

If you're not familiar with the Vanilla Bean, you can read about it at   http://www.vanillabeancafe.com/

 

I'll update this more as we get closer to the date :)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll stake out a table in the main room. It may be crowded, so come early :D

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: See Antje Duvekot Play at the Vanilla Bean in Pomfret
